Class RESTFunctionController

  • java.lang.Object

      • spring.controller.RESTFunctionController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/${path.users}/{userId}/${path.functions}")
public class RESTFunctionController
extends RESTAbstractController<RESTFunction,Function>
